channel.title: Israel-Hamas War on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Israel-Hamas War on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What’s Inside the Tiny Miracle Food Pouches That Can Save the Lives of Starving Gazans
item.description: Packed with calories and protein, the same magic mixture has successfully treated famine for decades—but due to funding cuts it’s now in short supply.

item.title: What’s Inside the Tiny Miracle Food Pouches That Can Save the Lives of Starving Gazans
item.description: Packed with calories and protein, the same magic mixture has successfully treated famine for decades—but due to funding cuts it’s now in short supply.

item.title: The Grave Long-Term Effects of the Gaza Malnutrition Crisis
item.description: The WHO believes one in five children in Gaza are acutely malnourished, with the health effects potentially lasting for generations.
